TEXT.TITLE: R.P. SCHERER <SCHS> OFFERS PREFERRED STOCK
TEXT.BODY: R.P. Scherer Corp said it is offering 1.6 mln shares of 5-3/4 pct convertible exchangeable preferred stock at 25 dlrs a share. Each stock is convertible into the company's common stock at 23.60 dlrs a share, which represents a conversion premium of 24.2 pct over the last sale price of 19 dlrs a share on March 11. Goldman, Sachs and Co is lead underwriter for the offering. Scherer said one of its directors, Richard Manoogian, said he will buy 200,000 shares of the preferred stock at the same 25 dlrs a share. The company said proceeds will be used for general corporate purposes including funding an increasing commitment to research and development on new drug formulations and delivery systems. Reuter
